_header: I trow in God Father of might that wrought
Note: Inserted in one MS of the ‘Boke of Penance;’ see 1155.

BodRawPoe175.First Lines:
I trow in god fader of myght þat wroghtHeuen & erth and
                    all of noght…
BodRawPoe175.Last Lines:
…And aw to hald þir poyntes twelueIf þat he will
                    saue him selue
